name: Camping Waldberg
description:
Located in the middle of the UNESCO Rhön Biosphere Reserve, surrounded by meadows, forests and clear streams.

A place for people who are in the mood for nature and yet off the beaten track  – with a thousand options. Here you write your own stories.
.....
Mitten im UNESCO – Biosphärengebiet Rhön gelegen, umgeben von Wiesen, Wäldern und klaren Bächen.

Ein Ort für Menschen, die Lust auf Natur haben und doch Abseits der Pfade des Overtourism – ohne volles Programm und Tausend Optionen. Hier schreibt man seine eigenen Geschichten,
ob ruhig oder naturwild.

name: Wohnmobilstellplatz Alsfeld
description:
Mobile home parking space for mobile homes, caravans, roof tents or similar. The place is in a quiet location, but still easy to reach. Alsfeld's old town and some supermarkets are within easy walking distance.

Prices: €5 per day, €0.50 per kw/h and water and waste water €1

name: Campingplatz am Weißenfels
description:
Our philosophy
Situated on the edge of the Soonwald, we offer you the ideal place to escape the stress of everyday life. Be it just for a weekend or a longer stay -.
Relax in a peaceful atmosphere in our recognised climatic health resort and let yourself be enchanted by nature.
Activities
Hiking, walking or a long stroll could be one of your first leisure activities when you arrive at our place. From Weissenfels, which gives its name to the village, you have a fantastic view over the landscape of the Rhine Valley.
To find out more about your leisure options, visit our surroundings section or take a look at our brochure.
Opening hours
Camping site:
Season start 6.4.2023
Arrival by arrangement
 
 
Restaurant:
Season start 7.4.2023
 

Monday - Wednesday: day off
Thursday - Saturday: from 6 pm
Sunday: 11-14 h || 17:30 - 20 h

name: Campingplatz Fläming Rast Körbitz
description: Nice small campground in the garden behind the owners house. Friendly people. They offer breakfast as well.

name: Water at gas station
description: Free tap water fill up at truck gas station

name: Wohnmobilparkplatz am Main
description: Dedicated parking for campers, free of charge - directly at the river Main. Also Lager ExMos have enough space.

name: Parking spot for RVs
description: Basic parking spot (with signage! So 100% legal) behind a city building. Place for 2 large RVs and numerous van style campers

name: Stellplatz Wilhermsdorf
description: Official place for mobile homes. Nice, free and quiet.

name: Neckarhäuserhofstraße bei Mückenloch
description: Easy parking lot close to a nice wood, you can park the car and sleep overnight next to a small street with very less traffic! Close by is a beautiful river and a nice walking area.

name: Kellinghusen
description: Nothing special. A paved parking lot outside the village beside a lake.

name: Camping Grüntensee
description: Nice Campsite with direct access to the Grüntensee lake. Tent, RV or Trailer. Coin Laundry available. No Wifi at the Tent Sites.

name: Park spot for Camper Vans at the lake
description: This park spot is for camper vans. The lake with excellent access is just across the street. As the park place is just beside the road, there is some traffic noice, but the night is generally quiet. Overnight fee is €10

name: Parkingspot Dentleiner Forst
description:
Small parking for one or two nights. Good path´s trough the forest for a walk. 
Restaurant in walking distance about 20 min.

name: RV Parking Space. Feuchtwangen
description: Free for 3 nights. You stay in spacious plots partitioned off with bushes. If full, there is another normal parking lot next door. Lots of shopping just around the corner. You can quickly walk to the center. Next door outdoor pool and sports field. Quiet at night. Place is on the street.

name: Roadside - Near Dorfgasse Rd
description:
Quiet place next to the emergency exit / maintenance entry of a train tunnel.

We stayed here for one night, small vans are not visible from the road. This might be different during the winter, when there is no foliage.

To get here you have to follow a short dirt track, but passenger cars should even be able to make it up here. Might be different after heavy rainfall.

name: Quiet Road just at the English Garden
description: This is a long quiet road with many park spots covered by trees. Many campers are here. Close to the city.

name: Oedberg Skilift Camping and Overnight Carpark
description: This is the Oedberg Skilift. It has an established camping 15€/night and a car par for 5€/night. There is also water for tank filling and a grey/black water dumping.

name: Dump and Water for Camper
description: Fresh Water 2€/200l grey- and blackwater dumping. No need to stay on campground to use these facilities.

name: Nimseck Camping
description: This is an established Campground. It is huge. Opt for premium plus to be situated at the river. Nice owner.

name: WoMoLand Nordstrand
description:
Small, private campsite. Pitches for RV's and caravans as well as a tent meadow. Mainly gravel ground at the pitches. Small vans can also stay on the tent meadow. Sanitary facilities are clean or as left by the previous user.
Barbecue evenings in the barn on Saturdays.
Prices 2023: €14.00 + €4.50 per person (excluding tourist tax).

Kleiner, privater Campingplatz. Stellplätze für Wohnmobile und Wohnwagen sowie Zeltwiese. Hauptsächlich Schotteruntergrund bei den Stellplätzen. Bullis können auch auf der Zeltwiese stehen. Sanitäre Anlagen sind sauber oder so wie der vorherige Nutzer sie hinterlässt. 
Samstags Grillabende in der Scheune. 
Preise 2023: 14,00€ + 4,50€ pro Person (exkl. Kurtaxe).

name: Eisvogel Tripkau V
description:
Nice and quiet place, away from the locals, close to water. Feels "wrong" on the way but its marked with a parking sign and a fireplace. 

You can get here with both truck and motorcycles.

name: Campingplatz Leuchtturm
description:
A big campground with everything you need. About 400 pitches for Campers, Caravans and tents are available.
Showers and toilets are nearly new and clean. A small shop is also available for your daily needs. Various rolls can be pre-ordered for the next morning.
It’s a short walk to the lovely beach where also a sailing school is located. 
prices in high season per night 
Camper >7 m 10€ 
1 Person            6€
Power.               3,5€
Tourist tax        2,5€

name: Campingplatz Karlsmark
description:
Small campsite with large pitches. Lots of grass, some gravel. In a calm neighborhood. You can quickly reach the center of Leck by bike.
19 euros/night (Bulli + 2 adults without electricity).
Kleiner Campingplatz mit großen Parzellen. Viel Rasen, teils Schotter. Ruhig gelegen. Mit dem Fahrrad ist man schnell im Zentrum von Leck. 
19 Euro/Nacht (Bulli + 2 Erwachsene ohne Strom).

name: Camping am Elbdeich
description:
Very small campsite behind the Elbe dike. You can pay in cash or with a card at the machine. Clean sanitary facilities (unisex). Near the old town, within walking distance to the lock. Restaurant also within walking distance.
Sehr kleiner Campingplatz hinter dem Elbdeich. Bezahlung bar und mit Karte am Automaten möglich. Saubere Sanitäranlagen (Unisex). Nähe Altstadt, fußläufig auch zur Schleuse. Restaurant ebenfalls fußläufig erreichbar.

name: Wildcampstefan
description:
24-hour parking lot right next to a bathing lake with toilets and a restaurant for eating in the evenings, very quiet
24h Parkplatz direkt an einem Badesee mit Toiletten und Gaststätte zum Essen abends sehr ruhig

name: Under the big wind turbine
description:
Secluded area by a nearby accessroad. Big road nearby, but no problems during night. Suitable for motorcycles but requires a bit of road in high grass. Might be slippery during the early mornings.

Big wind power plant just next to site, but you hardly notice it. It was on our entire night and we didn't hear it at all.

name: Tent spot
description: Small spot for max one tent beside a gravel road next to a field.

name: Badeplatz Trave
description: Nice spot near the Trave. You can take a bath, swim a little bit, you can sit

name: Roggenmühle
description: Restaurant. Fish breeding place for trouts. No services. If you ask the restaurant owner, he'll let you stay in a desígnated camper area.

name: Oberhaverbeck parking
description:
Great spot right at the heath. Car and camper spots. €13 for 24h. Lots of space. Grass and soil/sand. Only 8 electricity spots if needed (for €1 extra) Small cafe, open from 10-18h with toilet (€0.50). 
Bring some wedges while it’s not completely flat
Great place to start your hike or bike tour on the heathland

name: Weinsberg Stellplatz
description:
Free for three days. 
Water 100 ltr. = 1 Euro 
Electricity at side = 1kw 0,50 Euro
Space for about 20 mobiles 

only a few meters distance from town centre, Restaurants and bakery. Aldi and Lidl about 700 metres west of town.

name: Nightparking - Einsiedl am Walchensee
description:
Quiet and clean pitch for 12€ per night.  (max. 3 nights)
There are many campers here, but there is still enough space. In some places there is an electricity connection.

name: Finnhütte Feriendorf und Camping
description:
Not a ordinary campsite. It is an old GDR holiday village with just a handful of free places.
Two options: Directly at the big lake with great view or in the "village" near to forest lake with clear water for swimming.
Good food and beer in the little restaurant. 
Clean toilettes and showers.
Friendly staff!

name: Schönbach
description:
Small pitch/meadow for camping/tenting.
Motorhome up to a maximum of approx. 6 m possible.
10 euros per night for two people in the camper.
.....
Kleiner Stellplatz/Wiese zum Campen/Zelten.
Wohnmobil bis maximal ca. 6 m möglich.
10 Euro pro Nacht für zwei Personen im Camper.

name: Parking lot at scenic spot
description:
Was a good place for us to stay a night before proceeding further north. Was a little bit busy in the morning, but quiet at night. Typical camping isn't possible. The parking lot is directly in front of some vacation apartments and homes of locals. Please take care, to not bother them.
Towards the water is a rocky beach and a road that runs parallel to it. Beautiful spot, keep it clean!

name: Stotel
description: Four municipally owned sites in a quiet wooded area.   Free for 24 hours.   A hotel/restaurant adjacent and a lake with walking trails.

name: Kärcher
description: Spot for Campervans only. It’s a small pitch next to a Farmer. Power is available but your have to call somebody. There is a small hut with descriptions and an icecream vendingmachine.

name: Wohnmobilstellplatz Herrieden
description: A nice place near the river Altmühl and very near to the nice city. Good restaurants and Beergarden about 500 meters from place.

name: NoBi‘s Motorbike Garage
description: Repairshop / Garage  for motorbikes friendly help and proper knowledge

name: Water tap
description: Tap water at gas station, supposedly potable regarding to service guy.

name: Hike and Bike only Sohlacker
description:
Since you are not allowed to drive here, this place is only for hikers and cyclists. 

There is a shelter with a bench and a table. A fireplace with benches around and some picnic benches. 

In the night you can watch the stars and in the morning you can watch the sun rising in the valley. 

Cellphone reception is available, but not everywhere. On the bench next to the valley it seems to work quite well

name: Abandonned skilift parking
description: Big parking lot near abandonned skilift, lots of space and hiking trails nearby

name: In the forrest Taunus
description: Big flat parking lot, no infrastructure. No shade. At night there are only stars, no sounds

name: Abandonned ski lift
description: For those willing to drive 200m further in summer, there's an amazing spot near at the top of an abandoned skilift with an amazing view over the underlying valley

name: Eternahof
description:
Our family-run guesthouse offers horseback riding services and bicycle rental. It enjoys a quiet location on a riding stable with a farm in Lower Saxony, 5 km from the historic Bad Gandersheim in the Harz Mountains. 

You enjoy sustainable, regional food. All rooms and apartments feature modern furnishings, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. At Eternahof you can also use the barbecue facilities and relax in the property's garden. 

The bistro offers a seasonal, regional breakfast buffet as well as cold and warm dishes. Packed lunches are also available. The Sehusa Wasserwelt adventure pool is 9 km away and the scenic Harz National Park can be reached in a 30-minute drive. Younger guests can have fun in the children's playground at our guest house. The A7 motorway is 8 km from Eternahof, and Bad Gandersheim Train Station is 6 km away. The property also offers a shuttle service to the train station and free parking. 

We speak English and Spanish
---
Unsere familiengeführte Pension bietet Service rund ums Reiten und einen Fahrradverleih. Sie wohnen in ruhiger Lage auf einem Reiterhof mit Bauernhof in Niedersachsen, 5 km vom historischen Bad Gandersheim im Harz entfernt. Sie genießen nachhaltige, regionale Lebensmittel.

Alle Zimmer und Apartments verfügen über eine moderne Einrichtung, Sat-TV und kostenfreies WLAN. Die eigenen Bäder sind mit einem Haartrockner und kostenfreien Pflegeprodukten ausgestattet.

Am Eternahof können Sie außerdem die Grillmöglichkeiten nutzen und im Garten der Unterkunft entspannen. Das Bistro bietet ein saisonales, regionales Frühstücksbuffet sowie kalte und warme Speisen an. Lunchpakete sind ebenfalls erhältlich.

Das Erlebnisbad Sehusa Wasserwelt liegt 9 km  entfernt und den malerischen Nationalpark Harz erreichen Sie nach einer 30-minütigen Fahrt. Jüngere Gäste können sich auf dem Kinderspielplatz an unserem Gästehaus vergnügen.

Zur Autobahn A7 gelangen Sie vom Eternahof nach 8 km und vom Bahnhof Bad Gandersheim trennen Sie 6 km. Ein Shuttleservice zum Bahnhof und kostenfreie Parkplätze gehören zu den weiteren Annehmlichkeiten der Unterkunft.

Wir sprechen Ihre Sprache! Englisch/Spanisch

name: Wasserschlössle
description:
Small fountain with controlled water. 

The water from this building is used to supply Eastern Freiburg with water.

From here you have a nice view over Freiburg.

Please don't drive here with your motor vehicle.

name: Busses Guesthouse and Camping
description: This was a place we stayed in August, we didn't know it was a campsite too. We stayed in one of their rooms also on-site, alongside dedicated pitches for campers and tents. There was a restaurant on-site along with a bar and a few games. It is a short tram ride to Freiberg im Brasseau and that's a fantastic town at the bottom of the Black Forest.

name: Safari Service Land Rover
description: A very friendly familial garage and repair shop specialized in Land Rover and Defender. Very helpful and save the end of my trip.

name: Wohnmobilstellplatz
description: Paid parking space for 12 motorhomes on the outskirts of Ansbach. The pitch is located in a parking lot. Surface with grass grid. On site: snack bar, fresh water, electricity, dogs allowed. Nearby: Aquella with wave pool and 73 meter slide. Price per night: 12 euros. Payment: Parking ticket machine or groundsman. Disposal of gray water, disposal of chemical toilet included in the overnight price. Electricity: 50 cents/1 kWh, water: 50 cents/50 liters. Maximum stay: 2 nights.

description: A free parking space where 4 RV spaces are available. Despite being free, it is private property and the owner maintains it through donations. Normally 10 Euros are left.

name: wild camping with beach and firepit
description: 1km away from a campingplatz just off the cycling path. A small grassy area with some sand and a firepit, a couple of benches. Ideal for a swim in the evening/morning. Seems to be a spot for dogwalkers to let their dog go for a swim, but no bother. left undisturbed for the night.
